projects.name: Recipe Explorer
projects.description: Recipe Explorer fetches real recipes from Spoonacular, displays dynamic cards, lets you combine filters and sorting, hit “Surprise Me!” for a random pick, and handles empty or quota-exceeded states.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A collaboratively built, dynamic TypeScript app that uses the OpenWeatherMap API to deliver real-time conditions and a 4-day forecast in a fully responsive interface.
